channel.title: Yusuf Joseph on MeVsFalse
channel.description: Recent content in Yusuf Joseph on MeVsFalse

item.title: Story of Yousuf
item.description: Introduction Yusuf, Yousuf or Joseph is one of the son of Jacob (Yaqoob). You can find him in the Egyptian methology with the name USeb (Geb). Yusuf Name His name is Yusuf in the Quran. The alongation of U in his name leads us to his Egyptian name. In the story of Yusuf, he envisions himself as a bird on his head, and this is connected to his name, U Seb (Geb), which is why you might notice a quail chick on his head.
